entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the London location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-05-19 02:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-05-19 05:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, London instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Priority Network Maintenance

We are performing system changes in the Miami location during the following priority maintenance window. 
 

Start Time: 2021-05-14 07:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-05-14 11:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Miami instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the priority maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Emergency

We are performing system changes in the New Jersey location during the following emergency maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2021-05-13 07:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-05-13 11:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, New Jersey instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the emergency maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
